generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Orbitron:bold");body{background:#000;position:relative;box-sizing:border-box}nav{box-shadow:0 0 2rem .3rem #000}.btn,nav a{font-size:1.5rem}h1{font-family:Orbitron;font-weight:700;text-shadow:0 .2rem 2rem #000}.jumbotron-fluid p{text-shadow:.2rem .2rem 1rem #000,-.2rem -.2rem 1rem #000;font-size:1.5rem}.logo-sm{height:5rem}.logo-md,.logo-sm{-webkit-filter:drop-shadow(0 0 1rem #000);filter:drop-shadow(0 0 1rem black)}.logo-md{height:15rem}.jumbotron-fluid{margin-top:0;padding-top:5rem;background:radial-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,.3),#000),linear-gradient(transparent 60%,rgba(0,0,0,.7)),no-repeat 50%/cover url(152b3e40b307b07c44cd47c975c4f143.jpg)}.content-container{padding-bottom:2rem;min-height:500px}.container-fluid .content-container:nth-child(odd){background:#eee;color:#333}.container-fluid .content-container:nth-child(2n){background:#222;color:#eee}.content{width:90%;padding-top:1.5rem}.content p{font-size:1.5rem}footer{height:400px;background:#151515}#days-remaining{font-size:1.5rem;padding:2rem 1rem}@media only screen and (min-width:991px){.jumbotron-fluid p{font-size:1rem}nav ul li{margin-left:1.5rem;margin-right:1.5rem}nav ul li:first-child{margin-left:0}.btn,nav a{font-size:1rem}.content{width:65%}.content p{font-size:1rem}#days-remaining{font-size:1rem;padding:1rem}}
